text: Its my business. Ill tell you more. You're going to take over command of Pericles. Am I right? Who told Little bird Other half? John nodded. On me $ Bawley shook his head. All for by His Lordship; he said. Expense account. Youre a married man with a couple of kids. Can't go wasting your substance on a complete stranger. Set up, darling!
name: Paw-tey
